comment: essays are the majority of the grade and grades harshly; I had to take her because I got stuck with a math block pairing, if you can do not take, I did not get feedback for anything at all.

Awful professor as she doesn't grade essays until more than 6 weeks after it was submitted even while the syllabus said 2 weeks for grading. Little to no communication and no feedback given on essays while grading harshly by just circling categories with no reasoning to it. Furthermore, unresponsive to emails don't take this class.

MEANIE HEAD MISSES PUFF 


MISSUS FREE MEN IS DUMBY

SHE DIDNT LET ME USE THE TOILET I HAD TO USE A PLANT

SHAT STORMED !!!!

Was constantly cold and unhelpful with feedback. She cancelled class often, and graded assignments late if at all. She rarely lectured, just talked about the class agenda she wouldn't fallow. She would let her own personal politics get into the debates and assignments, She gave assignments due soon, but at last minute would postpone them. horrific.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: I could count how many times we had class in person on one hand. she usually sends a text saying class is cancelled, but one day everyone showed up but by 5:45 we started leaving. Class started at 5 and ended at 6:15. When I was in class, she only spent the time going over what the unit is about, never actually learned anything

As long as you email her with questions or concerns she will email you back. As for the grading, everything was mandatory and the little assignments were nothing to stress over. For the three major papers, I received no help. No peer review feedback. you walked into your assignments blind until the very end.

Professor Freeman did not provide any feedback, and you are left to just hope you're doing ok. You write a research paper throughout the semester but she never approves your topic, tells you what to improve on, etc. The only way you get feedback is from a peer review IF someone chooses to review it. Otherwise you have no idea how you're doing.

This class was extremely easy except for the 3 major assignments. Everything else we do is completion grades really but the major assignments are graded pretty tough. As a former ap student id say my essays are pretty sharp yet i was always getting 80-85 on the research paper assignments. She did bump my grade up to an A at the end
rating_tags: Tough grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She was a horrible professor, hard to get in contact with, doesnt grade anything you write until very end of semester, cancelled class all the time without an email/warning. Gave assignments with little to no explanation, so you basically go in blind on every paper most of the semester, barely any feed back, overall wouldnt recommend at all !!

Mrs. Freeman was pretty nice, she talked to students individually. She cares about her job, but she rarely gave feedback on essays. The class was fairly simple, there were so many essays though. If you dont like writing this class is not for you.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria--So many papers

comment: Cancels at last minute and rarely showed up. Did not actually lecture. Easy A, but i feel unprepared for future English classes.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--GRADED BY FEW THINGS
